__e: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, I am not a real lawyer.
Gentlemen of the jury, have you reached a verdict?
Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, it gives me no pleasure at all to speak to you this afternoon.
Distinguished guests, I want a fair fight!
--Distinguished guests, I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it.
Your Majesty and honorable guests I will tell you end of story.
Honourable members, the decision is yours.
Honourable members I swear before my God that you give me no alternative.
Your Honor, I've known this man for five years.
Your Honor, I'm happy we all took the time to make the best decision for everyone.
Your Honor, I'd like to, at this juncture, step out and call my attorney, if that's all right.
Your Honor, I'd like to, at this juncture, step out and call my attorney, if that's all right.
Your Honor not a day goes by that I don't wish I could take back what I did.
Your Honor, I'm happy we all took the time to make the best decision for everyone.
- Your honour, may I be heard?
